original_text: This was why the Jews were seeking all the more to kill him, because not only was he breaking the Sabbath, but he was even calling God his own Father, making himself equal with God.
korean_text: 유대인들이 이로 말미암아 더욱 예수를 죽이고자 하니 이는 안식일을 범할 뿐만 아니라 하나님을 자기의 친 아버지라 하여 자기를 하나님과 동등으로 삼으심이러라

sentences.original_text: This was why the Jews were seeking all the more to kill him
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 유대인들이 그를 더욱 죽이려고 찾던 이유였습니다

sentences.original_text: because not only was he breaking the Sabbath
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 안식일을 어길 뿐만 아니라

sentences.original_text: but he was even calling God his own Father
